level.heading: Sale of pawn or pledge - Disposition of surplus moneys.
level.text: The surplus money from the sale, after deducting the amount of the loan, the interest then due on the loan, and the expenses of the notice and sale, shall be paid over by the pawnbroker to the person who would have been entitled to redeem the pledge had the sale not taken place.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 19-171 enacted this subchapter into law.
